dcterms:description: A large-scale crowdsourcing project that collects ethical opinions on various scenarios related to the trolley problem, aiming to understand societal values in moral decision-making.
dcterms:title: Moral Machine

dcterms:creator: A. Dosovitskiy
G. Ros
F. Codevilla
A. Lopez
V. Koltun
dcterms:description: An open-source urban driving simulator designed for training, prototyping, and validating autonomous driving models, providing realistic environments and flexible configurations.
dcterms:title: CARLA

dcterms:creator: D. Abel
J. MacGlashan
M.L. Littman
dcterms:description: A project that explores the use of reinforcement learning as a framework for ethical decision-making in autonomous systems.
dcterms:title: Ethical Autonomous Vehicles

dcterms:creator: J. Jarvis Thomson
dcterms:description: A philosophical thought experiment that presents a moral dilemma involving a runaway trolley, used to explore ethical decision-making.
dcterms:title: Trolley problems (general reference)
